Articles.Content:
Hey guys, long time no see (lost my old account, fallofshadows)

I'm currently working on building a mun community, using my orbital construction craft that's orbiting the mun to send things down. I remember there being a munar rover/kart mod around, is that still around here? And does anyone have any advice on building an orbital construction craft that can easily land with the rover attached? I've only recently really gotten decent at landing, so I'm looking for an easy way to get my rover to the surface. My kerbals are getting tired of walking so far!

Thanks!

You can check Out my new rover's.

They're not very stable, but i'm working on a stable Version.

But there are no Kerbals in the rover's.

I'm working on it.
About your account, you need to reset your password to log back in the old account. We all had to reset our passwords after the switch to vB.

I made a (stock) mun station that includes a rcs rover. The descent stage is very stable and can even return to

kerbin. The rover itself can also return to kerbin. I'll make a download if you ask.

This Cart mod is good: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-33-Ladders-Context-menus-Multi-Unit-Support?highlight=cart

I used this in conjunction with the unmanned pods mod for my Satellite Explorer ship, which can deploy and recover 6 rovers from orbit.

Hey guys, sorry I haven't responded yet, I just got back to college and this week has been super busy.

@Nutt007: I tried resetting my password, the forums failed to send me an email with my new pass info. I figured I'd just make this account, it's not like I did much with the old one anyways.

@Others: Thanks for your suggestions, but I'm looking for a stable mod, not using stock parts (they just get stuck on hills/terrain cracks). Maxed-Rockets, I'll be giving that mod a test, thanks! It seems to be what I'm looking for, I'll dl it and test it out when I have a break from classes.
How about this? Download link is in my sig.

How about this? Download link is in my sig.

He wanted mods though.
I have a stock one aswell. Go to my yotube channel in my sig and you can see it, aswell as a tutorial for it.

How about this? Download link is in my sig.

How many Km can that thing rove one Tank of Fuel and still be able to get home?

I have about 6 stock rovers right now but he wants mods.

BTW, they're in my sig.
There's no pics or links for your 6 rovers..... It just says coming soon! It's kinda funny, I guess, but not really.

There's no pics or links for your 6 rovers..... It just says coming soon! It's kinda funny, I guess, but not really.
That's because barely any one replies to the thread. If people do, I'll release them.
